name: Recuérdame / Remember Me (GGJ-2019)
description:
Made during Global Game Jam 2019

This is a game of memory, and time is the ultimate thief of memory. Try to memorize the facial features of your family and find them. This game is playable in English and in Spanish.

Credits: 

Game Design: Austin Smith

Art: Carolina

Music: In the clouds by Stefan Kartenberg (c) \ncopyright 2019 Licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution Noncommercial  (3.0) license. \nhttp://dig.ccmixter.org/files/JeffSpeed68/59123 Ft: Javolenus
